Title: Active Directory User Manager
Description:
Tool to easily manage domain users in Active Directory.
Allows to easily add and manage user accounts in Windows Domain.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Tool to easily manage domain users in Active Directory.
Allows to easily add and manage user accounts in Windows Domain.


This release has followin features:
  • Easy search for user accounts with sorting and filtering.
  • Easy account creation.
  • Account editing
  • Custom attributes editing
  • Password change for account
  • Lock/Unlock specific account

In upcoming version it's planned to add support for managing Exchange mailboxes.
